description: This is an Angular component file defining the root application component 'AppComponent'. It imports the 'Component' decorator from Angular core and the 'LayoutComponent' for layout purposes. The component is marked as standalone and uses external HTML and CSS files for its template and styles.

classes.name: AppComponent
classes.description: The root Angular component for the application. Currently an empty class decorated with Angular's @Component, serving as the main entry point for the app layout.
